item.title: Aws Get Access Key Secret Key
item.description: 教你如何找到AWS Access Key ID and Secret Access Key Env aws Step 按照 教你如何找到AWS Access Key ID and Secret Access Key 完成 1-5 Step 1. Visit the Amazon Web Services web console. Step 2. Click My Account/Console at the top right corner of the web page. In this case User Name is Alexander. Step 3. In the drop-down list click the “Security Credentials” option. Step 4. Then you will be redirected to the “Your Security Credentials” page and see the following pop-up window: Step 5.
